Translations.Text: Kelk da them jen vi vi direkt blind eben ili ne seg
DI NENIAM wrongs POPOL; est POPOL wrong their own ANIM
Tag when Li summons all da them ili sent as ili last en this mond 1 hor tag which ili met Losers ja est those disbelieved meeting DI; chose misguided
Ni montr vi kelk (da retribution) ni promes them terminate your life antaux ke, us est their ultimate return DI witnesses CXIO ILI do
Al each community messenger. Post their messenger ven ili jugx equitably malplej injustice
Ili challenge When this prophecy ven pas vi telling truth
dir mi ne posed potenc harm benefit nur ki DI vol sorb met, Each community predetermined life sxpin! Once their interim ven end ili ne delay gxi 1 hor nor advance gxi
Dir Whether His retribution ven vi per nokt tag why est transgressors such hurry
Gxi okaz vi kred tiam? Why vi kred tiam? Vi uz challenge gxi ven
Gxi est dir al transgressors Gust etern retribution. Vi ne requited precisely ki vi earned
Ili challenge vi prophesy Est this really ki vol okaz Dir Jes ja my Lord this est truth vi neniam escape
